summary: This document contains details from a Dow Jones alert regarding Jeffrey Epstein, including his status as a Special Interest Person and information about his suspension from FINRA for discretionary trading violations. It highlights Epstein's financial status and the lack of monetary sanctions imposed on him.

persons.name: Jeffrey Richard Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a Special Interest Person and has a history of being suspended from FINRA for violations related to discretionary trading.

events.title: FINRA Suspension
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was suspended from association with any FINRA member for 10 business days due to violations related to discretionary trading.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was identified as a Special Interest Person by Dow Jones.
He was suspended from FINRA for 10 business days due to exercising discretion in a customer's account without proper authorization.
No monetary sanctions were imposed on Epstein due to his financial status.
The suspension was effective from April 16, 2012, to April 27, 2012.
